entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:47 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
